presets.name: Tight Funk Pop
presets.summary: Punchy, rhythmic clean tone with filtered envelope dynamics. Great for percussive funk grooves and tight chordal work.

presets.name: Percolator Funk Clean
presets.summary: Ultra-tight, percussive clean tone with a snappy attack and signature quack. Designed for crisp rhythm stabs and syncopated grooves.

presets.name: Purple Funk Groove
presets.summary: Classic Minneapolis funk vibe with shimmering clean tones and subtle grit. Perfect for funky rhythm work and smooth lead licks.
